hackathon-description-text: has the hottest, most social content on the web. We've seen the proliferation of technology in every aspect of our lives on the planet over the past few years and the news is no exception. Come learn, build, and meet awesome hackers at BuzzFeed's NYC Office
hackathon-eligibility: All NYU students are eligible, however, space is limited to 9 teams of no more than 6 members each. We're hoping to create the best experience for hackers so submissions must be from
hackathon-rules: Please start something new and fresh :). No old projects should be used. Please don't bring in any alcohol, drugs, firearms, knives, weapons (including toys).
